thread.title: Rapper Badshah wants to work with Adele
thread.title_full: Rapper Badshah wants to work with Adele

title: Rapper Badshah wants to work with Adele
persons: Abhi Toh Party Shuru Hui Hai
text: Rapper Badshah wants to work with Adele Monday, 26 October 2015 (8 minutes ago) *New Delhi, Oct 26 (ANI): Punjabi rapper Badshah, who is still basking in the success of his latest club banger 'DJ Waley Babu', was brought in as the headliner for the first edition of 10 Heads Festival in Delhi/NCR.* New Delhi, Oct 26 (ANI): Punjabi rapper Badshah, who is still basking in the success of his latest club banger 'DJ Waley Babu', was brought in as the headliner for the first edition of 10 Heads Festival in Delhi/NCR. The rapper, who has given hits like 'Abhi Toh Party Shuru Hui Hai' and 'Saturday Saturday' among others in Bollywood, also revealed his desire to work with one international singer. In an exclusive interview with ANI, the rapper said that he really wants to work with the Oscar-winning Brit singer Adele. When asked whom does he wants to work with in Bollywood after rapping for Salman Khan and Varun Dhawan, Badshah said that he wants to work with everyone as he respects them and also because they have carved a niche for themselves. The rapper also claimed that he is indeed the King of Desi Hip-Hop and his main aim is to kill the competition. By Ashish Kumar Singh (ANI)
